puffish_skills.categories.Elementalist.d:
§7Become an astral sorcerer and gain astral power that empowers all elemental spells.
 
§f §d+3 §7Astral Power
§f §d+8% §7Spell Critical Chance
§c §c+15% §7Spell Critical Damage
 
§f §dAstral Power
§7Learn to harness the power of the runes and stars to empower your spells, unlocking Astral Power, which increases the power of all elemental spells.
puffish_skills.categories.ascendancyBone:
§7
Taunt nearby enemies and shield yourself in a layer of bones, gaining an additional layer for each enemy taunted, up to a maximum of 6.
Taking damage removes a layer.
 
§f §c+1 §7Blood Power §8(Per Stack)

§fꦘ §9Corruption Effects§7
Extend the duration of the Taunt.

§fꦙ §930+ Corruption Effect§7
In addition to taunting nearby enemies, you also inflict them with Weakness.

§6 §8§n40s Cooldown§7
puffish_skills.categories.ascendancyCata:
§7
Lock yourself in place to channel a powerful spell that causes several comets to descend along a line in front of you.

Scales with the highest of your Frost or Fire spell power attributes.
Lasts 3.5s.

§fꦘ §9Corruption Effects§7
Increases comet frequency, allowing for more comets per cast.

§fꦙ §930+ Corruption Effect§7
For every comet summoned, gain a stack of Spellforged.

§6 §8§n70s Cooldown§7
puffish_skills.categories.ascendancyCycl:
§7
Violently swing your weapon around yourself while moving forward, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
This attack scales with Physical Damage and Haste.

§fꦘ §9Corruption Effects§7
Increases ability damage every 1 Corruption.

§fꦙ §930+ Corruption Effect§7
Cyclonic Cleave now pulls enemies it hits toward you.

§6 §8§n25s Cooldown§7
puffish_skills.categories.ascendancyRapi:
§7
Enter a firing stance and let loose a flurry of arrows.
You can move freely while in this stance, but you cannot take other actions.
Requires a Bow or Crossbow in mainhand.
Lasts 6s.

§fꦘ §9Corruption Effects§7
Increases effect duration.

§fꦙ §930+ Corruption Effect§7
Every third arrow fired now grants you a stack of Marksmanship.

§6 §8§n30s Cooldown§7
puffish_skills.categories.ascendancyRigh:
§7
Summon hammers that orbit you for a duration, dealing melee damage to nearby enemies and granting you 2% increased melee attack per hammer.

§fꦘ §9Corruption Effects§7
Summon an additional hammer for every 10 corruption.

§fꦙ §930+ Corruption Effect§7
Periodically create additional hammers that seek out and strike nearby targets.

§6 §8§n60s Cooldown§7

§7
While this ability is slotted, you generate a stack of §6Golden Aegis§7 whenever you block an attack. Golden Aegis increases Healing Spell Power, Armor, and Armor Toughness by 1% per stack. Max 15 stacks.

Activating this ability consumes all stacks of Golden Aegis to manifest a shield of holy energy that can be thrown for a variety of effects depending on the stacks consumed.

§7§6Less than 5 stacks:§7 The shield deals damage to enemies and ricochets 2 times.
§65 Stacks:§7 The shield deals increased damage to enemies and ricochets 5 times.
§610 Stacks:§7 The shield no longer damages enemies or ricochets and instead pierces and heals allies it passes through.
§615 Stacks:§7 The shield is larger, deals significantly more damage, and inflicts Death Mark, but it no longer ricochets.§7

§fꦘ §9Corruption Effects§7
Increases the maximum stacks of §6Golden Aegis§7 by 1 per 10 corruption.

§fꦙ §930+ Corruption Effect§7
While slotted, this ability now passively generates stacks of §aGolden Aegis§7.

Damage scales with Healing Spell Power.

§6 §8§n6s Cooldown§7
puffish_skills.categories.ascendancySkyw:
§7
Gain a stack of Barrier per stack of Might on you and charge forward, knocking back enemies and performing an upward strike, launching both you and your targets into the air before slamming them back into the ground.

This attack scales with the highest of your attack, ranged, or spell attributes.
Lasts 3.0s.

§fꦘ §9Corruption Effects§7
Increases ability damage.

§fꦙ §930+ Corruption Effect§7
Skyward Sunder now inflicts enemies hit during the charging phase with Deathmark.

§6 §8§n16s Cooldown§7
puffish_skills.categories.atkspeed.title: §f §e+12% §7Attack Speed for §dSupernova
puffish_skills.categories.bardActive.des:
§7
弹出刺耳的音律，眩晕周围的敌人，并对其施加负面效果，效果种类取决于你所用的乐器种类。

§fꦘ §9腐化效果§7
每点腐化度会延长效果的持续时间。

§6 §8§n冷却时间：40秒§7
puffish_skills.categories.bardPassive.de:
§7当你演奏乐器时，会为附近同一队伍（或结盟队伍）中的玩家提供buff

你演奏乐器的种类决定了提供的buff类型：

§6小号|风笛：§e壮志之音
§7- 造成的伤害提升10%，并获得生命恢复效果。
§6迪吉里杜管：§e铁壁之音
§7- 受到的伤害减少10%，并获得力量效果。
§6长笛：§e冲锋之音
§7- 移动速度提高30%，并获得海豚的恩惠效果。
§6琵琶：§e完璧之音
§7- 每秒恢复最大生命值的10%。
§6三角铁：§e血戮之音
§7- 提高20%攻击速度，造成的伤害提升5%。
§6Piano：§e破竹之音
§7- 提高20%攻击速度，移动速度提高10%。
